attributes.action: raise tenstions against attacks on muslim minority in Sri Lanka
attributes.additional_details:
This is To your concern,
A fear and panic situation risen in Sri Lanka by a Buddhist extremist group called 'Bodu Bala sena' against muslim minority on 15th of June 2014
3 people been killed,many are injured and shops and houses been attacked in the Incident.

After the Civil War between LTTE tiger rebels and the SL army came to an end continous verbal and physical attacks among muslim minority are taking place all over the place in Sri Lanka.

We fear that after many tamil people been killed during the civil war we muslims are their second target.

Therefore before anything worse can happen I personally would like to request to raise your voice to Sri Lankan Government and urge them to take necessary steps on so called Buddhist extremist group 'Bodu Bala Sena' who are responsible for such attackes on muslim minorities.

We respect you and its a humble
request on behalf of all Sri lankan Muslims.

Yours Faithfully,
Ashran Assahar
